title: New: Erik Jonasson – Like A Funeral (Joel Rampage Duet Remake)
body:
Loved the original of this track, so was slightly wary when I saw that there was a ‘remix’ of sorts – however it’s not your conventional, run of the mill, rework; instead Joel Rampage (of Postiljonen) turns **Erik Jonasson’s** _Like A Funeral_ into an epic, soaring number, including the addition of vocals from Mia of Postiljonen.

Pretty beautiful, life-affirming stuff. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
